content: Enable this setting to disable downloads of files and folders from this room shared via a link

comment.text: This translation key enables or disables the download of files and folders from a shared room when accessed via a link. It is used in a toggle block within an edit link panel to provide users with a choice on how to manage file downloads.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'otaq' (room) should ideally be 'ochan' (room) for better flow and accuracy within the context of a settings explanation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu ochan link vasitəsilə paylaşılan fayl və qovluqların endirilməsini deaktiv etmək üçün bu tənzimləməni aktiv edin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Enable this setting" is translated as "Ενεργοποιήστε αυτήν τη ρύθμιση". While technically correct, it sounds slightly formal and less natural in Greek. A more user-friendly translation would be "Ενεργοποιήστε αυτή την επιλογή" or "Ενεργοποιήστε αυτή τη λειτουργία".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ενεργοποιήστε αυτή την επιλογή

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "files and folders" is translated as "αρχείων και φακέλων". While correct, the definite article "τα" is missing before αρχείων.  This makes it slightly less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: τα αρχεία και τους φακέλους

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Active esta opción" is not the most natural way to say 'Enable this setting'. A better translation would be 'Habilite esta opción' or 'Activa esta opción'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Habilite esta opción

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a bit too literal and sounds awkward in Finnish. 'Ota tämä asetus käyttöön, jos haluat poistaa käytöstä...' is a long and complex way to express the functionality. It's better to simplify it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ota tämä asetus käyttöön estääksesi tiedostojen ja kansioiden lataukset tästä linkin kautta jaetusta huoneesta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '...' in the translation makes it sound hesitant and less confident. It would be better to avoid it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the ellipsis.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Enable this setting" is overly literal and sounds unnatural in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would be "Ենթադրեք այս կարգավորումը" or "Ակտիվացրեք այս կարգավորումը".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ենթադրեք այս կարգավորումը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "համօգտագործվում են հղման միջոցով" is a bit convoluted. A simpler way to express "shared via a link" would be "տրվում են հղմամբ" or "կիսվում են հղմամբ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: տրվում են հղմամբ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'stanza' (room) might not be the most natural translation in this context. It implies a physical room, but a 'room' in this digital sharing context is better translated as 'area' or 'spazio'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abilita questa impostazione per disabilitare i download di file e cartelle da quest'area condivisa tramite un link

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation starts with a space before 'Abilita'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abilita questa impostazione per disabilitare i download di file e cartelle da quest'area condivisa tramite un link

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "有効にした後" (yuukou ni shita ato) which translates to "after enabling" is slightly awkward and doesn't flow naturally in this context. It implies a previous disabled state that isn't directly implied by the English. A more direct and natural phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: この設定を有効にすると、リンク経由で共有されたこの部屋からのファイルとフォルダのダウンロードが無効になります

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '経由で共有された' (keiyu de kyouyousareta) meaning 'shared via' is technically correct, but slightly formal for a user-facing setting description. A more conversational alternative would improve clarity and user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: リンクで共有されたこの部屋からの

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເປີດໃຊ້' is a bit formal. While technically correct, 'ເປີດ' would be more natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເປີດການຕັ້ງຄ່ານີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ຈາກຫ້ອງນີ້ທີ່ແບ່ງປັນຜ່ານລິ້ງ' is a bit clunky.  A more natural phrasing would connect 'ຫ້ອງນີ້' directly to the sharing action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຈາກຫ້ອງນີ້ທີ່ຖືກແບ່ງປັນຜ່ານລິ້ງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "kopīgota, izmantojot saiti" is a bit clunky. A more natural flow might be achieved by rephrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iespējojiet šo iestatījumu, lai atspējotu failu un mapju lejupielādi no šīs telpas, kas dalīta ar saiti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'care au fost partajate printr-un link' is a bit clunky and could be improved for better flow. While technically correct, it isn't the most natural Romanian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Activați această opțiune pentru a dezactiva descărcarea fișierelor și folderelor din această cameră partajate prin link.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'shared via a link' is not accurately reflected in the Russian translation. 'Предоставлен доступ по ссылке' is a bit awkward and doesn't convey the directness of sharing through a link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Включите этот параметр, чтобы запретить загрузку файлов и папок, которыми поделились по ссылке, из этой комнаты

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'බාගැනීම' (baaganaeim) can be slightly ambiguous. While it generally means 'downloading', it could be more clearly expressed as 'බාගත' (baagath).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සබැඳියකින් බෙදා ගත් මෙම කාමරයේ ගොනු සහ බහාලුම් බාගත අබල කිරීමට මෙම සැකසුම සබල කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'බාගත අබල කිරීමට' is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'බා ගැනීම වැළැක්වීමට'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සබැඳියකින් බෙදා ගත් මෙම කාමරයේ ගොනු සහ බහාලුම් බා ගැනීම වැළැක්වීමට මෙම සැකසුම සබල කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'да онемогућиш преузимање' is grammatically awkward. It would be more natural to use a more direct phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Омогући ово подешавање да би се забранило преузимање датотека и фолдера из ове собе дељених путем линка

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Enable this setting' implies enabling a function that will disable downloads. The Serbian translation's phrasing, while technically correct, doesn't capture the intended implication of the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Омогући ову опцију да би се спречило преузимање датотека и фолдера из ове собе дељених путем линка

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. 'Omogući ovo podešavanje da onemogućiš...' is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be 'Omogući ovo podešavanje da spreči preuzimanje...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omogući ovo podešavanje da spreči preuzimanje datoteka i foldera iz ove sobe deljenih putem linka

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a comma (,) instead of a period (.) at the end of the first sentence. Ukrainian typically uses a period for sentence termination.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Увімкніть цей параметр, щоб заборонити завантаження файлів і папок із цієї кімнати, доступ до яких надано за посиланням.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Bật cài đặt này để tắt tải xuống tập tin và thư mục từ phòng này được chia sẻ qua liên kết' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness in Vietnamese. 'Tải xuống' is repetitive.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bật cài đặt này để ngăn chặn việc tải xuống tập tin và thư mục từ phòng này được chia sẻ qua liên kết.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not incorrect, the use of 'tập tin' and 'thư mục' is slightly formal.  Consider a more colloquial alternative for broader appeal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bật cài đặt này để ngăn chặn việc tải xuống file và folder từ phòng này được chia sẻ qua liên kết.
